import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { CartService } from '../cart/cart-service'; @Component({ selector: 'taco-header', templateUrl: 'header.component.html', styleUrls: ['./header.component.css'] }) export class HeaderComponent implements OnInit { cart: CartService; constructor(cartService: CartService) { this.cart = cartService; } ngOnInit() { } }
